pages.title: Loot Scrapping
pages.text: Aurorian loot can be smelted into scrap, which can then be used to repair tools, craft other special tools, or craft a powerful type of steel: $(#008cff)Aurorian Steel$()! You can also use the Scrapper that gives double the scrap!
Each type of scrap can be turned into their own Ingot.
$(#008cff)Aurorian Steel$() is the strongest metal in The Aurorian and can be made into new armor and tools. Check it out in the $(#008cff)Magical Items$() category for more info.

pages.title: What now?
pages.text: These ingots can then be used to forge new tools in the $(#008cff)Moonlight Forge$()! More info in the $(#008cff)Moonlight Forge$() chapter.
